title: BOSCH VAC022 Heavy-Duty Bags for Dry or Wet Material 3 Pack
features: Designed for wet or dry materials
Can be used on Bosch model 3931 and 3931A or vacumm cleaners part number VAC022
Tear-resistance and ideally suited for slurry-suction appliations
description: Through 80 years of developing innovative tools and accessories for the concrete professional, BOSCH has become the acknowledged leader in the industry. with a robust line that can address everything from the toughest concrete drilling tasks to material removal, BOSCH is a company whose legacy is written in concrete. If the project requires work in concrete, from polishing and anchoring to material removal, there's only one place to turn for a complete solution. Trust BOSCH to provide the professional-grade tools and accessories to get the job done right. Ideal for large-area material removal of lime, plaster, hard finish plaster, sandstone, and abrasive concrete.. The hard metal binding even resists loads caused by strongly abrasive materials.. Optimal use-asphalt, fresh concrete, pumice stone, screed concrete, aerated concrete, plaster, cast asphalt, soft limestone, and plaster mortar. May be used on-basalt, old concrete, stone concrete pipes, natural limestone, quartzite, and sandstone.

Bosch is the leader in power tool dust collection systems. Our dust collection solutions significantly reduce the amount of time spent cleaning up after a project. The Bosch VAC022 Air sweep heavy-duty bags are the perfect addition to any Bosch air sweep vacuum.
